{"id":1758926081,"question_id":3897,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1756960144,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1758926081/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Number of Trapezoids II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countTrapezoids(vector<vector<int>>& points) {\n        // naive solution: n^4, 6e10\n        // possible solutions: n^2logn, n^3\n\n        auto cross = [&](int i, int j, int k, int m) {\n            auto i0 = points[i], j0 = points[j];\n            auto k0 = points[k], m0 = points[m];\n            return (i0[1] - j0[1]) * (k0[0] - m0[0]) == \n                   (i0[0] - j0[0]) * (k0[1] - m0[1]);\n        };\n        auto inter = [&](int i, int j, int k, int m) {\n            if (cross(i, j, k, m)) \n                return !cross(i, j, j, k);\n            return false;\n        };\n        auto ok = [&](int i, int j, int k, int m) {\n            return inter(i, j, k, m) || \n                   inter(i, k, j, m) || \n                   inter(i, m, j, k);\n        };\n\n        int N = (int)points.size();\n        int sum = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j=i+1; j<N; j++) {\n                for (int k=j+1; k<N; k++) {\n                    for (int m=k+1; m<N; m++) {\n                        sum += ok(i, j, k, m);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-number-of-trapezoids-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1191}
